data.title: Ripple CEO Targets $180K Bitcoin Price by End of 2026; Binance, Solana Execs Diverge
data.description: Ripple CEO Brad Garlinghouse predicts the Bitcoin price will reach $180,000 by the end of 2026. The forecast was made during a panel at Binance Blockchain Week in Dubai.At the time of the panel, Bitcoin was trading near $93,342, down approximately 0.6% over the prior 24 hours and about 26% ...
data.keywords: Bitcoin price, Brad Garlinghouse, Binance Blockchain Week, Franklin Templeton, Lily Liu, Ripple, Solana
